    • findGroupByGroupName

      @GetMapping("/{groupName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> findGroupByGroupName(@PathVariable String groupName)
      Search a group by its name. If the user who asked for this group is a member, he will receive an instance of group which contains sensible intel about this group (such as expences and the group id). If the user is not a group member, an instance of group will be returned which does not contain sensible information.
      Parameters:
      groupName -
      Returns:
